channel.title: Lab News | Brain Signal Processing Lab

item.title: Graduation Ceremony 2023 for Minseok and Yeji
item.description:
Many congratulations for your degree, Minseok and Yeji!

You deserve it and all the best in the coming years!!

item.title: BESK 2023 Poster Award for Juhyeon Lee
item.description:
We participated the winter workshop of Brain Engineering Society of Korea (BESK), Welli Hilli Park, Heongsung-Gun, Gangwon-do.

At the workshop, Juhyeon Lee was received a Poster award at the BESK 2023 (Feb. 16-18; < 10%, five posters out of 51 Posters):

Many congratuations, Juhyeon and keep up the good work!

Also, thank other lab members for presenting their great works!

Of course, we had some funs! :)

item.title: KHBM 2022 Oral Presentation for Jundong Hwang
item.description:
Jundong Hwang was invited an oral talk at the KHBM 2022 (Nov. 18-19; < 10% out of over 60 Abstracts):
“Transfer Learning to Predict General Psychopathology Factor (p-factor) using Scanner-Generalization Neural Networks in Adolescents based on Resting-State Functional Connectivity”

Many congratuations and keep up the good work!

Also, Jundong received the best Oral Presentation Award as well (2 out of 6 presenters)!

item.description: We organized and attended the KHBM 2022 Summer School at Pyungchang!

item.title: Farewell for Jinwoo
item.description: Congratulations for your master’s degree and all the best for your future career, Jinwoo!

item.description: We attended the BESK 2022 Jeju!

item.title: OHBM 2022 Glasgow
item.description: We attended the OHBM 2022 Glasgow!

item.title: Farewell frame for Minji
item.description:
Congratulations and all the best for your future career, Minji!

You did a good job and we’ll miss you.

item.title: Prof. Lee's Birthday
item.description: Thank you for your congratulations! :)

item.title: ETRI Project Kick-off Meeting
item.description:
We had a kick-off meeting of this year’s ETRI project, “인간의 모달리티 학습과정의 고차인지 뇌기전 연구”

If you are interested joining this project, please feel free to let us know!

item.title: Prof. Lee gave an online talk at HMC NGV
item.description: Prof. Lee gave a talk entitled, “뇌공학 - 뇌신호 및 멀티 모달 데이터 기반 감정 추정 연구”

item.title: KHBM 2021 Poster Award for Jinwoo
item.description:
Jinwoo received a Poster Award at the KHBM 2021 (Nov. 5 - 6; only 10% out of approximately over 60 Posters).

Congratulations and keep up the good work!

item.title: Farewell frame for Sungman and Minyoung
item.description:
Congratulations and all the best for your future career, Sungman and Minyoung!

You did a good job and we’ll miss you.

item.title: Prof. Lee gave an online talk at BESK Workshop
item.description: Prof. Lee gave a talk entitled, “Brain Decoding and Encoding using fMRI Data and Neural Networks”

item.title: Farewell frame for Dr. Kim, Dong-Youl
item.description:
Congratulations, Dr. Kim and all the best in your new carrier!

We’ll miss you.

item.title: Dr. Kim, Hyun-Chul is a Professor at Kyungpook National University!
item.description:
Our former graduate student (currently, post-doc at Harvard Medical School) Dr. Hyun-Chul Kim will move to Kyungpook National University from September/2021 to become an Assistant Professor at the Department of Artificial Intelligence!

Many congrats Dr. Kim for your achievement!

All the best in your new position and keep up the great work!

item.title: Prof. Lee gave an online talk at ETRI
item.description: Prof. Lee gave a talk entitled, “Decoding and Encoding Patterns of Human Brain Activations.”

item.title: Prof. Joo, Yoonjung gave a talk in our lab about genetics research
item.description: Prof. Joo, Yoonjung (Research Professor, Institute of Data Science, Korea University) presented a seminar entitled, “Utility of Genome-wide Polygenic Score Approach to Find Genetic Links to Human Complex Traits.”

item.title: Brainstorming with Professor Yoo, Seung-Schik at Harvard Medical School
item.description:
We had a brainstorming session with Professor Yoo, Seung-Schik of Radiology at Harvard Medical School!

We have exchanged ideas related to emotion prediction and modulation using multimodal methods!

item.title: Prof. Lee gave an online talk about 'Real-Time fMRI Neurofeedback'
item.description: Prof. Lee gave a talk entitled, “Real-Time fMRI Neurofeedback” on clinical neuroscience seminar at Prof. Gunther Meinlschmidt’s class via Zoom.

item.title: Post-doctoral fellowship for Dr. Kim
item.description:
Our former graduate student (currently, Research Professor at Korea University) Dr. Kim, Dong-Youl recently awarded a post-doctoral fellowship from Virginia Tech to start the position this fall!

Dr. Kim will be working with world-renowned researchers (Profs. Pearl Chiu, Brooks King-Casas, and Stephen LaConte) to further extend his expertise on cognitive/social neuroscience using neuroimaging and real-time fMRI based neurofeedback.

Many congrats on his next career move and all the best in the new environment!

item.description: Happy Birthday!

item.title: OHBM 2021 Annual Meeting (Virtual)
New research grant on Imaging-Genetics
item.description: We have recently awarded a new three-year research grant from the National Research Foundation of Korea as the leading team of the second group of the teams in the BIG-BRAIN project!
